column4: Hi, I am trying to install ubuntu, I get to the screen that asks me to try without changing my computer, install, check disk etc.  I try to install but it just goes to a grey screen and doesnt do anything. I have tried the forums and couldnt find anything on this problem.
Well, this all happened a while back, and a guy told me about changing some options in f6, apic options, then had me edit something about splash and it worked fine
gParted is on your LiveCD. For more info on using gParted to install Linux, see the install guide
